{{short description|Adûnaic word}}
'''kalab''' is an [[Adûnaic]] verb root meaning "to fall down" or "to lean over". 
==Example==
*[[Akallabêth]], "she that has fallen"
*[[yakalubim]] "they lean over"

==References==
* [http://lalaith.vpsurf.de/Tolkien/Fr_Atani.html Lalaith's Etymologies to the Atani languages]
